text: An intermediate Chinese dialogue between friends discussing food plans.小明：丽丽，你今天中午吃什么？丽丽：我不知道，你有什么想法吗？小明：我们去吃汉堡吧？我听说附近商场新开了一个汉堡店。汉堡有牛肉芝士堡，鸡肉堡，还有套餐。而且，我听说，价格也不贵。丽丽：好啊，没问题，那我们去吃汉堡吧。我们可以点一个套餐。小明：可以，套餐里有汉堡，沙拉和饮料。丽丽：我好兴奋！小明：Lily, What will you eat for lunch today?丽丽：I’m not sure, do you have any ideas?小明：Let’s go eat burgers？I’ve heard that the nearby shopping mall has a new burger joint. They have cheeseburgers, chicken burgers, and set meals. Also, I’ve heard that the price is not expensive.丽丽：Ok, sure, then let’s go eat burgers. We can order set meals.小明：Yes, the set meals include burgers, salad and a drink.丽丽：I’m very excited!1 – 他们会吃什么？a. 他们会吃麦当劳b. 他们会吃肯德基c. 他们会吃汉堡d. 他们会吃米饭2 – 汉堡店价格贵不贵？a. 贵b. 不贵1. c2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
